abstract: A structure that defines a metadata key.

# AVMetadataKey

**Structure**

A structure that defines a metadata key.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AVMetadataKey
```

## Common metadata keys

- **commonKeyAccessibilityDescription**: A key that represents the accessibility description for the media.
- **commonKeyAlbumName**: A key that represents the name of the album.
- **commonKeyArtist**: A key that represents the name of the artist.
- **commonKeyArtwork**: A key that represents an image relating to the album.
- **commonKeyAuthor**: A key that represents the name of the author.
- **commonKeyContributor**: A key that represents the name of the contributor.
- **commonKeyCopyrights**: A key that represents the copyright statement.
- **commonKeyCreationDate**: A key that represents the date of the original recording.
- **commonKeyCreator**: A key that represents the name of the creator.
- **commonKeyDescription**: A key that represents the description of the media.
- **commonKeyFormat**: A key that represents the file format of the media content.
- **commonKeyIdentifier**: A key that represents the ID for the media.
- **commonKeyLanguage**: A key that represents the language of the text or lyrics spoken or sung in the audio.
- **commonKeyLastModifiedDate**: A key that represents the last modification date of the media.
- **commonKeyLocation**: A key that represents the location information for the media.
- **commonKeyMake**: A key that represents the name of the camera maker.
- **commonKeyModel**: A key that represents the name of the camera model.
- **commonKeyPublisher**: A key that represents the name of the publisher.
- **commonKeyRelation**: A key that represents the relation information for the media.
- **commonKeySoftware**: A key that represents the name of the software used to create the media.
- **commonKeySource**: A key that represents the source information for the media.
- **commonKeySubject**: A key that represents the subject information for the media.
- **commonKeyTitle**: A key that represents the title of the media.
- **commonKeyType**: A key that represents the media type.

## iTunes metadata keys

- **iTunesMetadataKeyAccountKind**: A key that represents the kind of iTunes account.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyAcknowledgement**: A key that represents the acknowledgement information in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyAlbum**: A key that represents the name of the album in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyAlbumArtist**: A key that represents the artist for the album.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyAppleID**: A key that represents an Apple ID.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyArranger**: A key that represents the name of the arranger.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyArtDirector**: A key that represents the name of the art director.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyArtist**: A key that represents the name of the artist.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyArtistID**: A key that represents the ID for an artist.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyAuthor**: A key that represents the name of the author.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyBeatsPerMin**: A key that represents the beats per minute of a track in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyComposer**: A key that represents the name of the composer.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyConductor**: A key that represents the name of the conductor.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyContentRating**: A key that represents the content rating in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyCopyright**: A key that represents the copyright statement in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyCoverArt**: A key that represents an album cover image.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyCredits**: A key that represents the credits for the source content.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyDescription**: A key that represents the description information in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyDirector**: A key that represents the name of the director.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyDiscCompilation**: A key that represents whether an album is a compilation of tracks in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyDiscNumber**: A key that represents the disc number of a multi-CD album in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyEncodedBy**: A key that represents the person or organization that encoded the media.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyEncodingTool**: A key that represents the software or hardware and settings used for encoding.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyEQ**: A key that represents the equalizer preset option in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyExecProducer**: A key that represents the name of the executive producer.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyGenreID**: A key that represents the genre ID.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyGrouping**: A key that represents additional grouping information for an album.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyLinerNotes**: A key that represents the digital booklet for an album.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyLyrics**: A key that represents the lyrics in the recording.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyOnlineExtras**: A key that represents the extra materials for an album.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyOriginalArtist**: A key that represents the name of the original artist.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyPerformer**: A key that represents the name of the performer.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyPhonogramRights**: A key that represents the phonogram rights statement.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyPlaylistID**: A key that represents the playlist ID.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyPredefinedGenre**: A key that represents the predefined genre.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyProducer**: A key that represents the name of the producer.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyPublisher**: A key that represents the name of the publisher.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyRecordCompany**: A key that represents the name of the record company.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyReleaseDate**: A key that represents the release date for the original recording.
- **iTunesMetadataKeySoloist**: A key that represents the name of the soloist.
- **iTunesMetadataKeySongID**: A key that represents the song ID.
- **iTunesMetadataKeySongName**: A key that represents the name of the song in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeySoundEngineer**: A key that represents the name of the sound engineer.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyThanks**: A key that represents the thanks statement in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyTrackNumber**: A key that represents the order number in iTunes.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyTrackSubTitle**: A key that represents the information relating to the contents title.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyUserComment**: A key that represents a user comment regarding the content.
- **iTunesMetadataKeyUserGenre**: A key that represents the genre set by a user in iTunes.

## QuickTime metadata keys

- **quickTimeMetadataKeyAccessibilityDescription**: A key that represents the accessibility description for the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyAlbum**: A key that represents the name of the album or collection in QuickTime.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyArranger**: A key that represents the name of the arranger of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyArtist**: A key that represents the name of the artist of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyArtwork**: A key that represents an image relating to the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyAuthor**: A key that represents the name of the author of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraFocalLength35mmEquivalent**: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating focal length normalized to the 35mm film equivalent value (e.g. “50.00mm”).
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraFrameReadoutTime**: A key that represents the camera frame readout time in QuickTime.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraISOSensitivity**: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating the sensitivity of the camera to light in terms of ISO exposure index (e.g. “800”). See SMPTE RDD 18.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraIdentifier**: A key that represents the camera identifier in QuickTime.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraLensIrisFNumber**: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating measure of the amount of light transmitted through the lens. It is the focal length divided by the effective lens aperture diameter (e.g. “F2.8” or “2.8”).
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraLensModel**: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating the lens model (e.g. “iPhone 16 Pro back camera 6.765mm f/1.78”).
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraShutterSpeedAngle**: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating the exposure period expressed as an angle in minutes (1/60 degree) (e.g. “21600” or “360.00deg””).
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraShutterSpeedTime**: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating the exposure period expressed as a time per one frame/field period in seconds.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraWhiteBalance**: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating the white balance value defined by the temperature in Kelvin units (e.g. “5500K” or “5500”). See SMPTE RDD 18.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCinematicVideoIntent**: A value of type `kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UInt8` indicating whether this movie is intended as a Cinematic Video (1) or not (0).
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCollectionUser**: A key that represents a name that indicates a user-defined collection.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyComment**: A key that represents a comment regarding the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyComposer**: A key that represents the name of the composer of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyContentIdentifier**: A key that represents the content identifier in QuickTime.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCopyright**: A key that represents the copyright statement for the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCreationDate**: A key that represents the creation date of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyCredits**: A key that represents the credits of the movie source content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyDescription**: A key that represents the description of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyDirectionFacing**: A key that represents the direction the camera is facing during the shot.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyDirectionMotion**: A key that represents the direction the camera is moving during the shot.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyDirector**: A key that represents the name of the director of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyDisplayName**: A key that represents the display name of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyEncodedBy**: A key that represents the name of the person or organization responsible for encoding the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyFullFrameRatePlaybackIntent**: An key that represents whether this movie should play at full frame rate.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyGenre**: A key that represents the genre or genres to which the movie content conforms.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyInformation**: A key that represents general information about the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyIsMontage**: A key that represents that the movie is a montage of other media.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyKeywords**: A key that represents the keywords for the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyLocationBody**: A key that represents the astronomical body for compatibility with the 3GPP format.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyLocationDate**: A key that represents a date and time using the extended format defined in ISO 8601:2004.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyLocationISO6709**: A key that represents the geographic point location by coordinates as defined in ISO 6709:2008.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyLocationName**: A key that represents the name of the location.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyLocationNote**: A key that represents a descriptive comment about the location.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyLocationRole**: A key that represents the single byte describing the movie location.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyMake**: A key that represents the name of the camera maker.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyModel**: A key that represents the name of the camera model.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyOriginalArtist**: A key that represents the name of the original artist of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyPerformer**: A key that represents the name of the performer in the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyPhonogramRights**: A key that represents the phonogram rights statement.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyProducer**: A key that represents the name of the producer of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyPublisher**: A key that represents the name of the publisher of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyRatingUser**: A key that represents the rating or relative value of the movie.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeySoftware**: A key that represents the name of software used to create the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyTitle**: A key that represents the title of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyWhiteBalanceByCCTColorMatrices**: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_RawData indicating the reference color translation matrix data for ProRes RAW.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyWhiteBalanceByCCTWhiteBalanceFactors**: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_RawData indicating the reference white balance multiplication factor data for ProRes RAW.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyYear**: A key that represents the recording year of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeMetadataKeyiXML**: A key that represents iXML information for the movie file content.

## QuickTime user metadata keys

- **quickTimeUserDataKeyAccessibilityDescription**: A key that represents the accessibility description for the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyAlbum**: A key that represents the name of the album or collection in QuickTime.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyArranger**: A key that represents the name of the arranger of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyArtist**: A key that represents the name of the artist of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyAuthor**: A key that represents the name of the author of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyChapter**: A key that represents the name of the chapter.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyComment**: A key that represents a comment regarding the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyComposer**: A key that represents the name of the composer of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyCopyright**: A key that represents the copyright statement in QuickTime.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyCreationDate**: A key that represents the creation date of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyCredits**: A key that represents the credits of movie source content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyDescription**: A key that represents the description of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyDirector**: A key that represents the name of the director of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyDisclaimer**: A key that represents the disclaimer regarding the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyEncodedBy**: A key that represents the name of the person or organization responsible for encoding the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyFullName**: A key that represents the full name of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyGenre**: A key that represents the genre or genres to which the movie content conforms.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyHostComputer**: A key that represents the name of the host computer.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyInformation**: A key that represents general information about the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyKeywords**: A key that represents the keywords for the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyLocationISO6709**: A key that represents the geographic point location by coordinates as defined in ISO 6709:2008.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyMake**: A key that represents the name of the camera maker.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyModel**: A key that represents the name of the camera model.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyOriginalArtist**: A key that represents the name of the original artist of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyOriginalFormat**: A key that represents the original format of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyOriginalSource**: A key that represents the original source of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyPerformers**: A key that represents the name of the performers in the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyPhonogramRights**: A key that represents the phonogram rights statement.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyProducer**: A key that represents the name of the producer of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyProduct**: A key that represents the name of the product.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyPublisher**: A key that represents the name of the publisher of the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeySoftware**: A key that represents the name of software used to create the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeySpecialPlaybackRequirements**: A key that represents the special hardware and software requirements for playback.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyTaggedCharacteristic**: A key that represents the tagged characteristic.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyTrack**: A key that represents a track in the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyTrackName**: A key that represents the name of a track in the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyURLLink**: A key that represents the webpage for the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyWarning**: A key that represents the warning text for the movie file content.
- **quickTimeUserDataKeyWriter**: A key that represents the name of the writer of the movie file content.

## ID3 metadata keys

- **id3MetadataKeyAlbumSortOrder**: A key that represents how to sort the album.
- **id3MetadataKeyAlbumTitle**: A key that represents the title of the recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyAttachedPicture**: A key that represents an image relating to the audio file.
- **id3MetadataKeyAudioEncryption**: A key that represents the encryption details of the audio stream.
- **id3MetadataKeyAudioSeekPointIndex**: A key that represents the list of seek points within the audio file.
- **id3MetadataKeyBand**: A key that represents additional information about the performers in the recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyBeatsPerMinute**: A key that represents the beats per minute of the audio.
- **id3MetadataKeyComments**: A key that represents additional text information for the media.
- **id3MetadataKeyCommercial**: A key that represents the commercial details for the media.
- **id3MetadataKeyCommercialInformation**: A key that represents the webpage containing purchasing information.
- **id3MetadataKeyComposer**: A key that represents the name of the composer.
- **id3MetadataKeyConductor**: A key that represents the name of the conductor.
- **id3MetadataKeyContentGroupDescription**: A key that indicates the sound belongs to a larger category of sounds or music.
- **id3MetadataKeyContentType**: A key that represents the media content type.
- **id3MetadataKeyCopyright**: A key that represents the copyright statement.
- **id3MetadataKeyCopyrightInformation**: A key that represents the webpage describing the terms of use and ownership.
- **id3MetadataKeyDate**: A key that represents the date for the recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyEncodedBy**: A key that represents the person or organization responsible for encoding the media.
- **id3MetadataKeyEncodedWith**: A key that represents the software or hardware and settings used for encoding.
- **id3MetadataKeyEncodingTime**: A key that represents the encoding time of the audio.
- **id3MetadataKeyEncryption**: A key that represents the encryption method used.
- **id3MetadataKeyEqualization**: A key that represents the equalization curve within the audio file.
- **id3MetadataKeyEqualization2**: A key that represents the equalization curve within the audio file.
- **id3MetadataKeyEventTimingCodes**: A key that represents the timing codes used for synchronization with key events in a song or sound.
- **id3MetadataKeyFileOwner**: A key that represents the name of the owner or licensee of the file and it’s contents.
- **id3MetadataKeyFileType**: A key that represents the file type of the audio.
- **id3MetadataKeyGeneralEncapsulatedObject**: A key that represents the details of a file.
- **id3MetadataKeyGroupIdentifier**: A key that represents the grouping of distinct frames.
- **id3MetadataKeyInitialKey**: A key that represents the musical key in which the sound starts.
- **id3MetadataKeyInternationalStandardRecordingCode**: A key that represents the international standard recording code.
- **id3MetadataKeyInternetRadioStationName**: A key that represents the name of the internet radio station streaming the audio.
- **id3MetadataKeyInternetRadioStationOwner**: A key that represents the name of the owner of the internet radio station streaming the audio.
- **id3MetadataKeyInvolvedPeopleList_v23**: A key that represents the list of names of contributors to the media.
- **id3MetadataKeyInvolvedPeopleList_v24**: A key that represents the list of names of contributors to the media.
- **id3MetadataKeyLanguage**: A key that represents the language of the text or lyrics spoken or sung in the audio.
- **id3MetadataKeyLeadPerformer**: A key that represents the main artist of the recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyLength**: A key that represents the length of the audio file in milliseconds.
- **id3MetadataKeyLink**: A key that represents the link information from an ID3 tag that might reside in another audio file or alone in a binary file.
- **id3MetadataKeyLyricist**: A key that represents the writer(s) of the text or lyrics in the recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyMediaType**: A key that represents which media the sound originated from.
- **id3MetadataKeyModifiedBy**: A key that represents the people behind a remix and similar interpretations of another existing piece.
- **id3MetadataKeyMood**: A key that represents the mood of the audio.
- **id3MetadataKeyMPEGLocationLookupTable**: A key that represents the lookup table used to increase performance and accuracy of jumps within an MPEG audio file.
- **id3MetadataKeyMusicCDIdentifier**: A key that represents the ID used to identify the CD in databases such as the Compact Disc Database.
- **id3MetadataKeyMusicianCreditsList**: A key that represents the mapping between an instrument and the musician that played it.
- **id3MetadataKeyOfficialArtistWebpage**: A key that represents the artist’s official webpage.
- **id3MetadataKeyOfficialAudioFileWebpage**: A key that represents the official webpage for the audio file.
- **id3MetadataKeyOfficialAudioSourceWebpage**: A key that represents the official webpage for the source of the audio file.
- **id3MetadataKeyOfficialInternetRadioStationHomepage**: A key that represents the official homepage of the internet radio station.
- **id3MetadataKeyOfficialPublisherWebpage**: A key that represents the official webpage for the publisher.
- **id3MetadataKeyOriginalAlbumTitle**: A key that represents the title of the original recording or source of sound.
- **id3MetadataKeyOriginalArtist**: A key that represents the performer(s) of the original recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyOriginalFilename**: A key that represents the original filename for the recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyOriginalLyricist**: A key that represents the text writer(s) of the original recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyOriginalReleaseTime**: A key that represents the release time for the original recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyOriginalReleaseYear**: A key that represents the release year for the original recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyOwnership**: A key that represents the transaction details indicating proof of ownership if signed.
- **id3MetadataKeyPartOfASet**: A key that represents the part of a set the audio came from.
- **id3MetadataKeyPayment**: A key that represents the webpage that handles the process of paying for the audio file.
- **id3MetadataKeyPerformerSortOrder**: A key that represents the performer sort order.
- **id3MetadataKeyPlayCounter**: A key that represents the play count of the audio file.
- **id3MetadataKeyPlaylistDelay**: A key that represents the number of milliseconds of silence between every song in a playlist.
- **id3MetadataKeyPopularimeter**: A key that represents the rating for the audio file.
- **id3MetadataKeyPositionSynchronization**: A key that represents the time offset of the first frame in the stream.
- **id3MetadataKeyPrivate**: A key that represents the information from a software producer that its program uses.
- **id3MetadataKeyProducedNotice**: A key that represents the produced notice.
- **id3MetadataKeyPublisher**: A key that represents the name of the label or publisher.
- **id3MetadataKeyRecommendedBufferSize**: A key that represents the buffer size the server recommends.
- **id3MetadataKeyRecordingDates**: A key that represents additional recording dates that complement year, date, and time keys.
- **id3MetadataKeyRecordingTime**: A key that represents the recording time.
- **id3MetadataKeyRelativeVolumeAdjustment**: A key that represents the increase or decrease of volume on each channel while the file plays.
- **id3MetadataKeyRelativeVolumeAdjustment2**: A key that represents the increase or decrease of volume on each channel while the file plays.
- **id3MetadataKeyReleaseTime**: A key that represents the time of the first release.
- **id3MetadataKeyReverb**: A key that represents the adjustments to echoes of different kinds.
- **id3MetadataKeySeek**: A key that represents the location of other tags in a file or stream.
- **id3MetadataKeySetSubtitle**: A key that represents the set subtitle the track belongs to.
- **id3MetadataKeySignature**: A key that represents the group of frames to sign.
- **id3MetadataKeySize**: A key that represents the size of the audio file in bytes.
- **id3MetadataKeySubTitle**: A key that represents the information relating to the contents title.
- **id3MetadataKeySynchronizedLyric**: A key that represents the words in the audio file as text in sync with the audio.
- **id3MetadataKeySynchronizedTempoCodes**: A key that represents the tempo codes used for a more accurate description of the tempo of a musical piece.
- **id3MetadataKeyTaggingTime**: A key that represents the time of tagging.
- **id3MetadataKeyTermsOfUse**: A key that represents the brief description of the terms of use and ownership of the file.
- **id3MetadataKeyTime**: A key that represents the time for the recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyTitleDescription**: A key that represents the name of the piece.
- **id3MetadataKeyTitleSortOrder**: A key that represents the title sort order.
- **id3MetadataKeyTrackNumber**: A key that represents the order number of the audio file.
- **id3MetadataKeyUniqueFileIdentifier**: A key that represents the identifier used to indicate the audio file in a database.
- **id3MetadataKeyUnsynchronizedLyric**: A key that represents the lyrics of the song or a text transcription of other vocal activities.
- **id3MetadataKeyUserText**: A key that represents the user text information frame.
- **id3MetadataKeyUserURL**: A key that represents the user webpage frame.
- **id3MetadataKeyYear**: A key that represents the year of the recording.
- **id3MetadataKeyCommerical**: A key that represents the commerical frame.

## 3GP user metadata keys

- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyAlbumAndTrack**: A key that represents the text for the album and track titles.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyAuthor**: A key that represents the author of the media.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyCollection**: A key that represents the collection name for the media.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyCopyright**: A key that represents the copyright statement.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyDescription**: A key that represents the description for the media.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyGenre**: A key that represents the genre of the media.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyKeywordList**: A key that represents the list of keywords for the media.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyLocation**: A key that represents the location information for the media.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyMediaClassification**: A key that represents the classification of the media content.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyMediaRating**: A key that represents the rating of the media content.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyPerformer**: A key that represents information about the performer.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyRecordingYear**: A key that represents the recording year for the media.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyThumbnail**: A key that represents the media thumbnail.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyTitle**: A key that represents the title for the media.
- **metadata3GPUserDataKeyUserRating**: A key that represents the user rating.

## ISO user metadata keys

- **isoUserDataKeyAccessibilityDescription**: A key that represents the accessibility description for the media content.
- **isoUserDataKeyCopyright**: A key that represents the copyright statement.
- **isoUserDataKeyDate**: A key that represents the date for the media content.
- **isoUserDataKeyTaggedCharacteristic**: A key that represents the tagged media characteristic used for identifying accessibility features.

## ICY metadata keys

- **icyMetadataKeyStreamTitle**: A key that represents the title of a stream.
- **icyMetadataKeyStreamURL**: A key that represents the web address of a stream.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a metadata key.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a metadata key with the specified raw value.

## Metadata

- **Retrieving media metadata**: Load descriptive metadata for media assets and their tracks.
- **AVMetadataItem**: A metadata item for an audiovisual asset or one of its tracks.
- **AVMutableMetadataItem**: A mutable metadata item for an audiovisual asset or for one of its tracks.
- **AVMetadataIdentifier**: A structure that defines identifiers for metadata formats.
- **AVMetadataKeySpace**: A structure that defines a metadata key space.
- **AVMetadataExtraAttributeKey**: A structure that defines keys for extra metadata attributes.
- **AVMetadataFormat**: A structure that defines metadata formats.
- **AVMetadataItemFilter**: An object that filters selected information from a metadata item.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating focal length normalized to the 35mm film equivalent value (e.g. “50.00mm”).
items.name: quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraFocalLength35mmEquivalent

items.description: A key that represents the camera frame readout time in QuickTime.
items.name: quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraFrameReadoutTime

items.description: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating the sensitivity of the camera to light in terms of ISO exposure index (e.g. “800”). See SMPTE RDD 18.
items.name: quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraISOSensitivity

items.description: A key that represents the camera identifier in QuickTime.
items.name: quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraIdentifier

items.description: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating measure of the amount of light transmitted through the lens. It is the focal length divided by the effective lens aperture diameter (e.g. “F2.8” or “2.8”).
items.name: quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraLensIrisFNumber

items.description: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating the lens model (e.g. “iPhone 16 Pro back camera 6.765mm f/1.78”).
items.name: quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraLensModel

items.description: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating the exposure period expressed as an angle in minutes (1/60 degree) (e.g. “21600” or “360.00deg””).
items.name: quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraShutterSpeedAngle

items.description: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating the exposure period expressed as a time per one frame/field period in seconds.
items.name: quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraShutterSpeedTime

items.description: A value of type kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UTF8 indicating the white balance value defined by the temperature in Kelvin units (e.g. “5500K” or “5500”). See SMPTE RDD 18.
items.name: quickTimeMetadataKeyCameraWhiteBalance

items.description: A value of type `kCMMetadataBaseDataType_UInt8` indicating whether this movie is intended as a Cinematic Video (1) or not (0).
